files.patch:
@@ -136,0 +136,12 @@
+  # Set ASSERT, NDEBUG and PRODUCT flags just like in JvmFlags.gmk
+  ifeq ($(DEBUG_LEVEL), release)
+    ADLCFLAGS += -DNDEBUG
+    ifneq ($(HOTSPOT_DEBUG_LEVEL), optimized)
+      ADLCFLAGS += -DPRODUCT
+    endif
+  else ifeq ($(DEBUG_LEVEL), fastdebug)
+    ADLCFLAGS += -DASSERT
+  else ifeq ($(DEBUG_LEVEL), slowdebug)
+    ADLCFLAGS += -DASSERT
+  endif
+
